result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Becky.
Case called: 9:40 am
INCLUDES 15CM887, 15CM2399, 15CM2385 & 16CM202
Date and Time set for Sentencing After Revocation in 15CM887 & Plea Hearing in 15CM2399, 15CM2385 & 16CM202
State appears by ADA Michael Puerner; Def appears in custody with Atty Pauline Toulouse;  

***PLEA HEARING in 15CM2399, 15CM2385 & 16CM202***
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed; VRCW;
State moves to: D&RI 15CM2385 & 16CM202
COURT GRANTS

PLEA: 
15CM2399
Ct 1 (Criminal Damage to Property/DA/Repeater)>NO CONTEST
Ct 2 (DC/DA/Repeater)>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: SHW for 2 years probation. CONDITIONS: SAFE Intake program and any recommended follow up; Maintain FTW/School or combination of the two, and if not fully engaged, complete 10 hours CS per week; A/T/C as deemed appropriate by agent; No contact with T.E. unless approved by agent; CC; 2-DA surcharges; DNA sample and surcharge.

***SENTENCING AFTER REVOCATION IN 15CM887***
COURT ORDERS: Ct 1> 90 days MCJ w/huber for work/school/child care & counseling if deft meets jail criteria.
COURT notes deft has 41 days credit.

Adj: 9:50 am

INCLUDES 15CM2385,15CM2399, & 16CM202 WPD police escort retrieve any personal belongings.   No contact with T.E. -NON WAIVABLE. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.

Clerk Becky.
IINCLUDES 15CM2385 & 15CM2399
Case Called: 2:36 pm
State appears by ADA Michael Puerner & Desiree Toldt; Def appears in custody with Atty Pauline Toulouse;
Aty Puerner states new charges were filed and deft will be making IA next week.
Parties state agreement has not been reached. 
COURT advises parties to file MIL and proposed jury instructions 1 week before trial. 
32 jurors to be called in for 1 day trial

Adj: 2:37 pm

Pre-trial conference at 01-14-2016 09:10 am.
Final pre-trial at 01-22-2016 02:30 pm.
Jury Trial at 02-09-2016 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Lashan M. Dixon
Current: 2300 N 13th Street Apt 1C, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 12-21-2015)

Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
